notes: Fourth-generation Civic. Available as sedan, hatchback, or wagon. Manual transmission available. Reliable compact car. Data sourced from Wikipedia Honda Civic article, January 2025 revision.
Third-generation Civic. Available as sedan, hatchback, or wagon. Manual transmission available. CRX sport coupe variant. Data sourced from Wikipedia Honda Civic article, January 2025 revision.
Third-generation Accord. Available as sedan or hatchback. Manual transmission available. Growing popularity. Data sourced from Wikipedia Honda Accord article, January 2025 revision.
Second-generation Accord. Available as sedan or hatchback. Manual transmission available. Building reputation for reliability. Data sourced from Wikipedia Honda Accord article, January 2025 revision.
Second-generation Prelude sport coupe. Manual transmission available. Sporty styling. Pop-up headlights. Data sourced from Wikipedia Honda Prelude article, January 2025 revision.
Third-generation Prelude. Four-wheel steering available. Manual transmission available. Sport coupe. Advanced technology. Data sourced from Wikipedia Honda Prelude article, January 2025 revision.
Sport coupe variant of Civic. Lightweight and fuel-efficient. Manual transmission available. Si performance model. Cult classic. Data sourced from Wikipedia Honda CR-X article, January 2025 revision.
